name: SwashBarklers: A Dog Pirate Adventure!
description:
Swashbarklers is an action adventure platformer created by a team of 5 in Spring of 2021.  The idea sparked from a single utterance of the phrase "dog pirates" and they never looked back.  With their defined art style chosen early on, the design of the levels and gameplay swiftly followed after. 

Team:

Alexa H - Artist/Animator

Maxwell H - Lead Programmer

Aidan N - Lead Designer

Zach A - Design and Sound

Herve A - Level Design and Art

How to Play:

WASD to Move

Space to Jump

Z to Attack
